items: Start in a pushup position with one hand on a kettlebell and the other hand on the ground.
Lower your body down towards the ground, keeping your core engaged and your elbows close to your body.
As you push yourself back up, explosively lift your hand off the kettlebell and switch hands, placing the other hand on the kettlebell.
Lower yourself down again, this time with the opposite hand on the kettlebell.
Repeat for the desired number of reps.
Increases upper body strength
Improves explosive power
Engages core muscles for stability
Challenges coordination and balance
Burns calories and promotes weight loss
Can be modified for different fitness levels
Chest muscles (pectoralis major and minor)
Shoulder muscles (deltoids)
Triceps
Core muscles (abdominals and lower back)
Leg muscles (quadriceps and glutes)
